English: Quantitative easing program must be followed by balance sheet normalization in inflation targeting.

English: Expansionary fiscal stimulus must be evaluated by public debt sustainability analysis.
Arabic: يجب تقييم التحفيز المالي التوسعي من خلال تحليل استدامة الدين العام.

English: Floating exchange-rate regime must be monitored by currency intervention mechanism during carry trade.
Arabic: يجب مراقبة نظام سعر الصرف العائم من خلال آلية التدخل في العملة خلال تجارة المناقلة.

English: Core inflation measure must be monitored by inflation expectations survey for policy credibility.
Arabic: يجب مراقبة مقياس التضخم الأساسي من خلال مسح توقعات التضخم لمصداقية السياسة.

English: Natural rate of unemployment must be estimated by structural unemployment mismatch analysis.
Arabic: يجب تقدير المعدل الطبيعي للبطالة من خلال تحليل عدم التطابق في البطالة الهيكلية.

English: Basel III capital requirements must include stress testing exercise for too-big-to-fail resolution.

English: Comparative advantage theory must guide trade-weighted exchange rate under WTO dispute.

English: Platform economy model must align with digital tax policy for big data analytics.

English: Carbon pricing mechanism must achieve Paris agreement target through emissions trading system.
Arabic: يجب أن تحقق آلية تسعير الكربون هدف اتفاقية باريس من خلال نظام تداول الانبعاثات.

English: Loss aversion bias must be addressed by nudge theory application in default option setting.
Arabic: يجب معالجة تحيز النفور من الخسارة من خلال تطبيق نظرية الدفع الناعم في إعداد الخيار الافتراضي.

English: Tier 1 capital ratio must exceed the capital conservation buffer under leverage ratio exposure limits.
Arabic: يجب أن تتجاوز نسبة رأس المال من المستوى الأول حاجز الحفاظ على رأس المال ضمن حدود التعرض لنسبة الرافعة المالية.

English: Liquidity coverage ratio must be maintained above 100 % during liquidity stress testing.
Arabic: يجب الحفاظ على نسبة تغطية السيولة فوق 100% خلال اختبار ضغط السيولة.

English: Net interest income sensitivity must be managed by duration gap analysis under hedging strategy effectiveness.
Arabic: يجب إدارة حساسية صافي دخل الفوائد من خلال تحليل فجوة المدة ضمن فعالية استراتيجية التحوط.

English: Open banking API must be secured by cyber-security resilience in cloud-native architecture.
Arabic: يجب تأمين واجهة برمجة التطبيقات للخدمات المصرفية المفتوحة من خلال المرونة في الأمن السيبراني ضمن البنية السحابية الأصلية.

English: Probability of default model must pass model validation back-testing under internal ratings-based approach.
Arabic: يجب أن يجتاز نموذج احتمالية التخلف عن السداد الاختبار الرجعي للتحقق من صحة النموذج ضمن النهج القائم على التصنيفات الداخلية.

English: Adverse scenario design must include macro-economic variable shock for capital adequacy projection.

English: Non-bank financial institution must undergo systemic risk assessment under regulatory perimeter extension.

English: Paris Agreement alignment must include physical risk assessment for green bond issuance.

English: Unfair contract terms must be corrected by transparent fee disclosure through financial ombudsman service.

English: High-frequency trading algorithm must respect order-to-trade ratio under colocation server hosting.

English: Algorithmic trading strategy must pass back-testing validation process for smart order routing.

English: Black-Scholes pricing model must be calibrated to implied volatility surface for delta hedging.
Arabic: يجب معايرة نموذج تسعير بلاك-شولز لسطح التقلب الضمني للتحوط بالدلتا.

English: Futures contract specification must include margin call mechanism for basis risk hedging.

Arabic: يجب على منصة التبادل المركزية تأمين المفتاح الخاص للمحفظة أثناء تداول أزواج العملات المستقرة.

English: Exchange-traded fund creation must achieve tracking error minimization under intraday portfolio disclosure.

English: Cointegration relationship test must validate pairs selection before z-score threshold signal.

English: Emissions allowance auction must follow additionality verification process for Paris agreement alignment.
Arabic: يجب أن يتبع مزاد بدلات الانبعاثات عملية التحقق من الإضافية للتوافق مع اتفاقية باريس.

English: Weighted average cost of capital must be calculated before net present value calculation in capital budgeting.
Arabic: يجب حساب المتوسط المرجح لتكلفة رأس المال قبل حساب صافي القيمة الحالية في ميزانية رأس المال.

English: Capital asset pricing model requires beta coefficient estimation for expected return calculation.

English: Yield to maturity calculation must include duration convexity analysis for interest rate sensitivity.
Arabic: يجب أن يتضمن حساب العائد حتى الاستحقاق تحليل تحدب المدة لحساسية سعر الفائدة.

English: Black-Scholes option pricing must be calibrated to implied volatility surface for delta-neutral hedging.
Arabic: يجب معايرة تسعير خيارات بلاك-شولز لسطح التقلب الضمني للتحوط المحايد للدلتا.

English: Value-at-risk calculation must be supplemented by conditional value-at-risk under stress testing scenario.
Arabic: يجب استكمال حساب القيمة المعرضة للخطر بالقيمة المعرضة للخطر المشروطة ضمن سيناريو اختبار الضغط.

English: Board independence requirement must include ESG reporting standards for audit committee oversight.

English: Initial public offering process must include book building mechanism for aftermarket price stabilization.
Arabic: يجب أن تتضمن عملية الطرح العام الأولي آلية بناء سجل الأوامر لتثبيت السعر في السوق الثانوية.

English: Robo-advisory services must include client risk profiling questionnaire before machine learning allocation.

English: Letter of credit issuance must be supported by export credit insurance under forfaiting transaction structure.

English: Catastrophe bond issuance must use parametric trigger design for investor spread demand.

English: Taxonomy-compliant investment must include ESG data quality assurance for greenwashing risk mitigation.

English: Retail CBDC design must include privacy preservation mechanism for cross-border interoperability.

English: Mean-variance optimisation must include covariance matrix estimation for efficient frontier curve construction.

English: Capital asset pricing model requires beta coefficient measurement for security market line plotting.

English: Black-Scholes partial differential equation must be solved under log-normal distribution assumption for delta-neutral hedging.

English: Modigliani-Miller proposition must include tax shield benefit for capital structure trade-off analysis.

English: Efficient-market hypothesis must be tested by abnormal return testing under behavioral finance challenge.

English: Arbitrage pricing theory requires factor loading estimation under no-arbitrage condition.

English: Prospect theory value function must incorporate loss aversion coefficient to explain disposition effect trading.

English: Value at risk model must pass back-testing validation process after confidence level selection.

English: Gordon growth formula requires perpetual growth assumption below required rate of return for terminal value calculation.

English: Real options valuation method requires volatility estimation process for binomial tree model construction.

English: Drop-shipping fulfillment model must include order tracking integration to reduce returns handling complexity.

English: Social commerce platform must use influencer marketing campaign for shoppable post creation.

English: Unified inventory management must provide real-time stock visibility for click-and-collect service.

English: Bank-run equilibrium model must include deposit insurance guarantee for moral-hazard mitigation.
Arabic: يجب أن يتضمن نموذج توازن السحب على البنوك ضمان التأمين على الودائع للتخفيف من الخطر الأخلاقي.

English: Natural experiment design must use instrumental variable estimation for minimum wage impact evaluation.

English: Randomized controlled trial must include cost-effectiveness analysis for scalable intervention design.

English: Integrated assessment model must use social cost of carbon for optimal abatement pathway.

English: Principal-agent problem must be solved by optimal contract design under incentive compatibility constraint.

English: Consumption smoothing behavior must be estimated by household survey data for poverty measurement methodology.

English: Efficient-market hypothesis test must include long-term return predictability for empirical asset pricing model validation.
Arabic: يجب أن يتضمن اختبار فرضية السوق الكفؤة إمكانية التنبؤ بالعوائد طويلة الأجل للتحقق من صحة نموذج تسعير الأصول التجريبي.

English: Gale-Shapley algorithm must use deferred acceptance mechanism for incentive-compatible matching.

English: Search-and-matching model must include wage bargaining power for job-matching efficiency analysis.

English: Common-pool resource governance must adopt polycentric governance system for tragedy of the commons prevention.

Arabic: يجب أن تتضمن نظرية التجارة الجديدة تفسير وفورات الحجم للتنبؤ بتأثير السوق المحلي.

English: Revelation principle theorem must produce incentive-compatible mechanism for robust mechanism design.
Arabic: يجب أن تنتج نظرية مبدأ الكشف آلية متوافقة مع الحوافز لتصميم آلية قوية.

English: Expectations-augmented Phillips curve must anchor inflation expectation for monetary policy neutrality.
Arabic: يجب أن يرسخ منحنى فيليبس المعزز بالتوقعات توقعات التضخم لحيادية السياسة النقدية.

English: Common knowledge assumption must sustain credible commitment mechanism in repeated game strategy.
Arabic: يجب أن يدعم افتراض المعرفة المشتركة آلية الالتزام الموثوق في استراتيجية اللعبة المتكررة.

English: Time inconsistency problem must be solved by rule-based policy commitment for reputation mechanism building.
Arabic: يجب حل مشكلة عدم الاتساق الزمني من خلال الالتزام بالسياسة القائمة على القواعد لبناء آلية السمعة.

English: Long-run equilibrium relationship must be tested by cointegration relationship test before error correction model.
Arabic: يجب اختبار علاقة التوازن طويلة الأجل من خلال اختبار علاقة التكامل المشترك قبل نموذج تصحيح الخطأ.

English: Prospect theory framework must include loss aversion magnitude for utility function curvature explanation.
